original_text: We should live in a good way, because we live in the light of day. We should not go to wild parties. We must not be drunks. We must not have sex with anyone who is not our own wife or husband. We must not do wrong things with our bodies. We must not quarrel. We must not be jealous of other people.
korean_text: 낮에와 같이 단정히 행하고 방탕하거나 술 취하지 말며 음란하거나 호색하지 말며 다투거나 시기하지 말고

sentences.original_text: We should live in a good way
because we live in the light of day
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 우리는 낮의 빛 속에 살기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: We should not go to wild parties
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 미친 파티에 가지 말아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: We must not have sex with anyone who is not our own wife or husband
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 자신의 아내나 남편이 아닌 누구와도 성관계를 해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: We must not do wrong things with our bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 우리 몸으로 나쁜 일을 해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: We must not be jealous of other people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 다른 사람들을 질투해서는 안 됩니다
